section.title: Workflow Introduction
section.para: Workflows are XML descriptions of the basic logic of a project.
Workflows are at the center of how Pegasus operates. Pegasus takes in an abstract workflow ( DAX ) and generates an executable workflow (DAG) in the submit directory. the submit Directory

section.title: Abstract Workflows
section.para: Abstract workflows (DAX) are a basic description, in XML format, of the workflow steps required to resolve computational challenges.

section.title: Executable Workflows
section.para: Executable Workflows (DAG) are generated by Pegasus from the information contained in the Abstract Workflow (DAX) that are prepared to run in a designated environment to process data contained in catalogs in accordance with the specifics of the DAX.
